announcements.details: Listen to the Homily for the 8th Sunday in Ordinary Time by Rev. Fr. James Gyekye Danso
announcements.title: Homily: 8th Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 9th March, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Wednesday borns and the Christian Sons and Daughters Association respectively. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 1st Sunday of Lent

announcements.details: Please be informed that registration of students for the school visitation project is opened.  Parents should submit details with any of the school visitation team members or PYC executives
announcements.title: School Visitation

announcements.details: Registration for our Lenten pilgrimage is ongoing. The place of this year's pilgrimage is Our Lady of Lourdes Grotto, Osonson in the Eastern Region. The date for the pilgrimage is Saturday, 29th March, 2025. Every participant is to pay a minimum commitment fee of 50 cedis.
announcements.title: Lenten Pilgrimage

announcements.details: Ash Wednesday falls on 5th March, 2025. There will be TWO masses at 6am and 7pm on the day. Parishioners who have their last year's palm branches are encouraged to drop them with the administrator during the week.
announcements.title: Ash Wednesday

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Marriage School opens on 16th February, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2025 should please pick up registration forms from the office of the Rector.
announcements.title: St Bakhita Marriage School

events.details: Date: 29th March, 2025 | Venue: Our Lady of Lourdes Grotto, Osonson
events.title: Lenten Pilgrimage

sacraments.details: Kindly contact the church office to register for Infant Baptism
sacraments.subtitle: First Saturday of every month, after Grotto Mass
sacraments.title: Infant Baptism

sacraments.subtitle: The St Bakhita Marriage School opens on 16th February, 2025.
sacraments.title: Marriage School

sacraments.subtitle: By appointment with the priest in charge.
sacraments.title: Confession
